name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Last Sunday: Plan, Achieve, Live Fully

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live life to the fullest. See your remaining Sundays, reflect, and dream big.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every Sunday, a chance to breathe, dream, and live. 
The Last Sunday reminds you, with each new tab, how precious those Sundays are. 
See your remaining Sundays, visualize your goals, and seize the day. 
Don't let life pass you by. Live life to the fullest.
